casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 25, 2014

[Cite as 04/25/2014 Case Announcements #3, 2014-Ohio-1772.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-1292. State ex rel. Doner v. Zehringer.

In Mandamus. This cause came on for further consideration upon the filing of appellant’s motion for leave to file supplement to evidence.

It is ordered by the court that respondents shall file a response, if any, to the motion no later than 12:00 p.m. on Monday, April 28, 2014.
